alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:57PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CENTRE...SOUTHWESTERN LYCOMING AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 956 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lock Haven, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Lamar, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Duboistown, Castanea, Blanchard, McElhattan, Cogan Station, Mackeyville, Bald Eagle State Park, South Williamsport, Garden View, Beech Creek, Oval and Salladasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming
